Name: sin-naseemismailand-lad
Author: Naseem Ismail And Masoor Maulana, Kaleel

Translations.Text: itāmat abhāgyavantayeku misa, (vena kisivekut) ē tuḷaṭa ætuḷu vannē næta
ohu (apagē āyāvan) boru kara, pratikṣēpa kara damanu æta
bhaya bhaktikayāma eyin bērenu æta
ohu (pāpayangen tamanva) pariśuddha kara gænīma piṇisa tamangē vastuva (dānamāna vaśayen) denu æta
ohu piḷituru vaśayen diya hæki andamaṭa kisivekugē kṛtagnabhāvayak ohu kerehi notibiyadī
itāmat usas tama deviyangē śuddha vū bāra gænīma kæmati vī (dānamāna karanu æta)
(deviyan ohuṭa labā dena varaprasādayan gæna) pasuva ohuda tṛptiyaṭa pat vannēya
peravaruvē (ālōkaya) mata sattakinma
san̆gavā gannā (andhakāra) rātriya mata sattakinma
(nabiyē!) obagē deviyan obava athæra dæmuvēda næta. (obava) piḷikul kaḷēda næta
(obagē) pasu tatvaya pera tatvayaṭa vaḍā niyata vaśayenma obaṭa itāmat usas vaśayen ættēya
obagē deviyan nævata (nævatat vividha usas padavīn) obaṭa labā denu æta. (emagin) oba tṛptiyaṭa pat vannehiya
anāthayeku vaśayen obava duṭu ohu (obaṭa) vāsasthānayak (labā dī anugrahaya) dækvūvē nædda
yamak kara kiyā gata nohækiva oba siṭinu duṭu ohu ṛju mārgayehi (obava) ætuḷu kaḷēya
diḷin̆dukamin siṭi obava duṭu ohu, (obava) dhanavateku bavaṭa pat kara hæriyā (noveda)
ebævin (mēvāṭa kṛtagna vanu piṇisa) oba anāthayin samaga kōpa novanu
hin̆gaman illannāva eḷavā nodamanu
(obava dæna siṭina) oba deviyangē varaprasādayan (an ayaṭa) dænum dī (ohuṭa kṛtagna vemin) siṭinu mænava
(nabiyē!) obagē hṛdaya api vistīraṇaya kaḷē nædda
obagē barada obagen ǣt kara api bæhæra kaḷemu
eya obagē tunaṭiya kaḍā damamin tibuṇi
obagē kīrtiyada api oba venuven usas kaḷemu
niyata vaśayenma duk gæhæṭa samaga sæpatak æta
ættenma duk gæhæṭa samaga sæpatak æta
ebævin (lovehi kāraṇāvangen) oba ǣt vū vahāma (næmadumaṭa) oba pariśramaya æra ganu
